channel.title: Need a quick code
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I need a quick code that will make use dragonic visage with anti dragon shield turn into a dragon fire shield.

item.title: Need a quick code
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

In client.java search for:

Code:
if ((itemUsed ==
Once you found that, you might see something like this:

Code:
if ((itemUsed == 1061 ) && (useWith == 2357)) {
deleteItem(1061, getItemSlot(1061), 1);
deleteItem(2357, getItemSlot(2357), 1);
addItem(2914, 1);
}
Then after the } Add this:

Code:
if ((itemUsed == 2366 ) && (useWith == 2368)) {
deleteItem(2366, getItemSlot(2366), 1);
deleteItem(2368, getItemSlot(2368), 1);
addItem(1187, 1);
}
if ((itemUsed == 2368 ) && (useWith == 2366)) {
deleteItem(2366, getItemSlot(2366), 1);
deleteItem(2368, getItemSlot(2368), 1);
addItem(1187, 1);
} [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2008, 08:47:07 AM[/size][hr]Change Around To Your Liking
